contents: Article 2 (Function) The Fair Election Commission advises on the following matters. Revised on May 10, 2022. Advice in response to a request by the Local Sports Council Election Steering Committee for advice on the authoritative interpretation of election-related matters for city/provincial and city/county/district sports council presidents (hereinafter referred to as ‘local sports council presidents’). 2. Advice on the authoritative interpretation of matters related to the election of member sport organization presidents by the Member Sports Organization Election Management Committee 3. Regarding the election of local sports presidents by the Sports Fair Committee of city/provincial sports associations to the Sports Fair Committee of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *Sports Association) 4. Advice on disciplinary action if a request for reconsideration of disciplinary action is requested 4. If a request for review or reconsideration of disciplinary action related to the election of member event head of a member event organization (including the Election Management Committee and the Fair Sports Committee) is requested to the Sports Fair Committee of the Sports Association. 5. Advice on other important election-related matters [Material revised 2020. 11. 05.]
